document_data.caption: A map showing the Red Stag in the north section of Corwell.
document_data.name: the Red Stag
document_data.mainbody: The '''Red Stag''' was an [[inn]] located in the town of [[Caer Corwell]] on the island of [[Gwynneth]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: The Red Stag was a quiet inn that served savory food. Most of the barmaids that worked here were quiet and shy.
document_data.Inhabitants: A lady named [[Miriam]] owned the Red Stag.
